name: Kamath Residency
tag_list: hotels--resorts, picnic-spots-near-pune, tourist-places-near-pune, one-day-picnic, resort-near-pune, -adventure-activities, water-sports, holiday-packages, top-picnic-spots, adventure-sports, resort-near-mumbai, resort-near-panvel, resort-near-navi-mumbai
overview:
Kamath Residency is a beautiful resort, one of the best tourist places & picnic spots near Mumbai / Pune. Offers the best of Adventure, Rejuvenation & Relaxation.

A weekend away from the routine to a green and beautiful destination near pune is refreshing and rejuvenating. Nagothane is a charming and evergreen location and one of the top tourist destinations around Pune. If you are planning a 2 day trip, Kamath Residency resorts offers attractive holiday packages. There are a number of places to visit near Pune. Nagothane, in the Raigad district captivates tourists with its attractions. Most of the enjoyable picnic spots near Pune are at comfortable driving distances from Kamath Residency.

• Majestic Raigad Fort • The Beautiful Amba River • The Pali Ganesh Mandir • The Dhundi Vinayak Temple • The Murud Janjira Fort • The Bhira Dam • The Usarvardhane Waterfalls • The Famous Alibaug Beaches of Kihim and Mandwa • The Nandgaon and Kashid Beaches • The Birla Temple

This place near Pune can easily be called a hill station complete with trekking and adventure around Pune. Kamath Residency offers adventure activities and water sports; including white water rafting, rappelling, rock climbing, swimming, rifle shooting, It’s an adventure lovers delight! It’s not just a top tourist destination, but is also popular venue for corporate training and summer camps.

More information on best value and affordable holiday packages please read - http://www.kamathresidency.com/blog/picnic-spots-near-pune-tourist-places-near-pune
